## ProgressBuilderOptions.percentageStyle property

Style for rendering the percentage text.

**Signature:**

```typescript
percentageStyle?: Style;
```

## Remarks

Uses `Style` from `@boba-cli/chapstick` to apply terminal colors and formatting.
